name: The Strange Possession
description:
This game is part of the Second Vaultacular Game Jam! The theme for the jam was "A strange influence" with the limitation being "Only 3 items". 

Take control!

You can take over 1 of 3 monsters at a time to gather the 3 loot bags on each level.

Each monster has unique abilities that are activated by pressing the SHIFT key.

Take possession by clicking on one of the monsters and move with WASD

Collect all the lootbags and get to the end.
